docs.snippet: A Saudi-led coalition battling Shiite rebels and their allies in Yemen used U.S.-supplied bombs in an airstrike last month on a market that killed at least 119 people, a human rights group said Thursday, further highlighting American involvement i...
docs.lead_paragraph: A Saudi-led coalition battling Shiite rebels and their allies in Yemen used U.S.-supplied bombs in an airstrike last month on a market that killed at least 119 people, a human rights group said Thursday, further highlighting American involvement in the conflict.

headline.main: Saudi Coalition Used US Bombs in Obliterating Yemen Market

docs.snippet: Germany prospered in recent years by exporting to emerging countries. Now the slowdown in emerging markets is leaving Germany, and Europe, vulnerable....
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany prospered in recent years by exporting to emerging countries. Now the slowdown in emerging markets is leaving Germany, and Europe, vulnerable.
docs.abstract: Germany faces economic lag, with trade to emerging markets down and business confidence fading; was more reliant on exports to emerging markets than European neighbors, though negative consequences are likely to affect whole region; reduced spending in China has been particularly strong factor.

headline.main: German Economy, Once Europe’s Leader, Now Looks Like Laggard
